GameEngine

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameEngine.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The serializable version of a GUI Game state. This class is serializable version of a snapshot of the GUI grid at a given instance of time. It contains a serializable representation of the players via an ArrayList, and a serializable version of the GUI grid via a Grid object.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    adsrc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
